history.content:
Since you enter as a freshman in 2018, you must take data 8 to declare data science major

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Full list below: And calculus requirement could be fulfilled by ap

RequirementPreferred TrackAlternate Course Options
Foundations of Data ScienceData 8 (COMPSCI/STAT/INFO C8)
Calculus IMath 1AMath 10A or 16A
Calculus IIMath 1B
Linear AlgebraMath 54 or Stat 89A (4 unit offering)EL ENG 16A and EL ENG 16B (both required), or Physics 89
Program StructuresCS 61A or CS 88ENGIN 7
Data StructuresCS 61B
Since you enter as a freshman in 2018, you must take data 8 to declare data science major

I entered as a freshman in the college of L&S in 2018. I've already taken CS61A, CS61B, and Stat 20. I'm an intended data science major. Does this mean I still need to take Data 8 and Data 100 (i.e. I can't simply take Data 100) to declare my major?
history.subject: Course Suggestions
